Articles.Content:
<p><img src="http://media.tumblr.com/301cb0bc17ca76a396dc75e2651dee4d/tumblr_inline_mwoyyvnJFd1rr2wit.jpg"/></p>

<p>*** <iframe frameborder="0" height="315" src="//www.youtube.com/embed/Omm8K6fhH_A" width="420"></iframe></p>

<p>Today’s <strong>FanWork Friday</strong> comes to us from <strong>Nassault</strong>. He and his crew worked very tirelessly to deliver a truly stunning 20 minute short film from the world of <em><strong>Kerbal Space Program</strong></em>. Full of gorgeous visuals and a penchant for emotionally wrenching themes, <strong>Pale Blue Dot</strong> is worth your attention.</p>
Nassault sure knows how to make a good cinematic.
This is very nice work
0_0 that was amazing.
I'm not sure what my expectations were going in, but they were blown out of the water. Truly amazing.
I...I've never been so moved by something in my entire life...I would pay all the money in the world to see this in the movie theater as a full length feature
Man, give Nassault (and his crew?) an award for this!
only a third as long as some movies. but daaamn thats awesome.
That gave me more chills than pretty much any movie I have ever seen. Very well done.
I want to make cinematics like that, but it will be a long time before I reach that standard. But hey! Life's not about the destination, it's about the journey.
Extremely impressive piece of work ... ! The soundtrack, the images, the speech of Carl Sagan ... its really a perfect combination.

That, was art. Very moving. That is truly an inspiring piece of work.

Very well done. Very well done indeed.
dat space plane...
"Someone found our message in a bottle, that we cast upon the great wide ocean - and just as we hoped, they came to see us."
I've seen it before but I agree. It is amazing. His short KSP movie "Star Stuff" is great too.
Round of applause for Nassault, Rareden and Chickenkeeper24 for such an awesome movie!
seriously I need that space plane....
I'm impressed. Author really caught that thing which makes KSP players to play.
I love that put put in the Carl Sagan audio clips. Great movie.

Awesome......

I have nothing else to say ( O_O) /
The Video just made me cry when i actually thought about the concepts that the video tried to bring across to the general audience
Wow, that's just.... wow. There's no words.
Just. Great.
NASSAULT ROCKS! His cinematics in general are pretty awesome
